description: Demolish of existing rear extension and erection of single storey side/rear extension.
decision_conditions: The proposed extension would project approximately 5.3m beyond a rear wall and would extend beyond an original side elevation and would be greater than half the width of the original dwellinghouse, contrary to A1.(f)(i) and A1.(j)(iii) respectively of Class A, Part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

It has not been demonstrated that the materials for the proposed development would be of a similar appearance to those used in the construction of the exterior of the existing dwellinghouse. Therefore the proposed development would fail to comply with condition A3.(a), Class A, Part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL Name: MC1  Maldens and Coombe
